General.Name: Thesis Gold Inc
General.Description: Thesis Gold Inc., a junior resource company, engages in the mining of mineral properties in North America. The company explores for gold and silver deposits. It holds interest in the Ranch and Lawyers gold-silver projects located in the Toodoggone mining district of north central British Columbia, Canada. The company was formerly known as Benchmark Metals Inc. and changed its name to Thesis Gold Inc. in August 2023. Thesis Gold Inc. is based in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 1111 West Hastings Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6E 2J3
